data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Malabarba, Luiz R., Bertaco, Vinicius A., Carvalho, Fernando R., Litz, Thomas O. (2012): Revalidation of the genus Ectrepopterus Fowler (Teleostei: Characiformes), with the redescription of its type species, E. uruguayensis. Zootaxa 3204: 47-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210066
